mapper.insert: insert into basic_unit (pkid, name, parentid, sortnum, type, path, stageids, fpinyin, spinyin, createtime,manageuser) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{manageuser,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update basic_unit set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentid = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stageids = #{stageids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fpinyin = #{fpinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spinyin = #{spinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, manageuser = #{manageuser,jdbcType=INTEGER} where pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select pkid, name, parentid, sortnum, type, path, stageids, fpinyin, spinyin, createtime,manageuser from basic_unit
select pkid, name, parentid, sortnum, type, path, stageids, fpinyin, spinyin, createtime,manageuser from basic_unit WHERE manageuser=#{0} limit 1
